title: When someone says "Unpopular opinion but" and then states a popular opinion
body:
"Unpopular opinion, but I would be ok if they nerfed Yasuo"
http://i.imgur.com/xI8SF2X.gif?Noredirect

replies.body: Unpopular opinion but I agree with LaughingFish.
Unpopular opinion, but I like it when people agree with me.
http://cdn0.dailydot.com/uploaded/images/original/2017/1/11/biden-gif-farewell.gif
Unpopular opinion, but I think this is a popular opinion.

Unpopular opinion, but unpopular opinions are popular opinions

Oh stop it, I'm blushing right now!

Also, I've recently finished this anime, can't wait for season 2!

http://i.imgur.com/MoVsVH5.gif[/img]
What anime is it?
Nanatsu no Taizai (The Seven Deadly Sins)
It's reeaaal good
Omoshiroi!

Can someone explain it with the nosebleed? It's incredibly disturbing. Kinda like needles through fingernails and i don't see how it makes any sense to be bleeding from your nose when you see something arousing.
More like its the anime equivalent of a male character sweating profusely around an attractive female character.
It's the anime equivalent of an erection
Referring to nothing. Okay. I though it's a comical exaggeration of an actual symptom because blood goes to the head etc and medical reasons.
Nah, they just can't put it in the actual show, so they just do nosebleeds instead
Unpopular opinion, but this post is just** fishing** for upvotes with circlejerk
Unpopular opinion, I play league of legends
No you don't.
i know, i spend most of my time spamming boards :^)

Basically me

I don't think I've played ranked since early april

But what if the Popular opinion states that what we perceive as popular opinion is an attempt by others to make popular opinion into unpopular opinion but we already know that it in reality, it's just popular option to begin with?
http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/facebook/000/085/283/philosoraptor.jpg
How appropriate that this is directly above an "Unpopular Opinion" thread on the front page!
http://puu.sh/vFmYK/6e720a55c5.jpg
unpopular opinion but I love riot games.
Unpopular opinion, but Adolf Hitler was a pretty bad guy if you think about it.

That is an unpopular opinion though, most people want him gutted.
unpopular opinion...but... SUN > moon
Now here's a real unpopular opinion - though i dont play him myself, i have nothing against Yasuo.
Unpopular opinion but Laughing Fish posts the best gifs.
That's why I stopped visiting 9gag. It was full of those "unpopular opinions".
this may be an unpopular opinion, but i feel there are more posts complaining about popular "unpopular opinions" than posts with popular "unpopular opinions".
